item.title: Trump officials are vowing to end school desegregation orders. Some parents say they're still needed
item.description: Six decades after the federal government ordered Concordia Parish to desegregate its schools, the district remains racially divided

item.title: South Dakota is on track to spend $2 billion on prisons in the next decade
item.description: South Dakota is on a path to invest $2 billion into its corrections facilities in the next decade as a result of its stringent crime laws

item.title: Boulder Jewish Festival proceeds with enhanced security and focus on healing after attack
